title: Front Carrier with Bag – Carry more, ride smarter.
description:
With 18 L of weatherproof storage and space for up to 5 kg, this frame-mounted bag keeps your gear secure and dry — even on rough roads. Quick to detach, it doubles as a shoulder bag for easy off-bike carry. Two waterproof outer pockets keep the small stuff safe.

Prefer your headlight on the carrier? No problem — it mounts there too for steady, road-following illumination.
